reviewText: But eminently watchable and listenable. Do a search on the internet. You can now acquire this on DVD! Go get it!
As I commented on "ladyann"s review, this video has been a staple in our home for years. It's wonderfully entertaining, and has a great message. Rich's love for the Lord is contagious.

We were so thrilled when someone dug down in their vhs tapes and put this out to purchase. We had seen bits and pieces on youtube and really wanted to see the whole thing. We were not disappointed. Rich had so much talent and the bits of wisdom and off-the cuff messages between songs are so moving. I want to share this with everyone I know because no one should miss it. I read that someone said Rich was a man with one foot in heaven and one foot on earth and he never really settled here. This is very evident in this video as it is in many of his songs. This extremely talented man lived on a reservation and gave everything he had to the needy. It's evident in this video. I hope they will remake all the video's because many of his things are no longer available. If you get the chance to see this, don't miss it. We paid more than the average video but it was a blessing to us.
